data.title: Dedication & Tribute Opportunities
data.text:
Bronze Leaves

Honor a loved one with a personalized tribute inscribed on a bronze leaf.

American Beech Leaf: A gift of $1,000

Sugar Maple Leaf: A gift of $3,000

American Linden Leaf: A gift of $5,000

Bur Oak Leaf: A gift of $10,000

For more information contact the zoo’s Annual Giving Team at annualfund@lpzoo.org or Matt Blatchford at (312) 742-5842.

Benches

With gifts of $10,000 or more, benches can be dedicated at various locations across the zoo. Bench plaque inscriptions can accommodate up to five lines of text with up to 50 characters per line.

For more information contact the zoo’s Annual Giving Team at annualfund@lpzoo.org or Matt Blatchford at (312) 742-5842.

Tribute Gifts

Make a donation to Lincoln Park Zoo in honor of a loved one. A tribute card will be sent to the recipient.

Make a Tribute Gift

Legacy Tribute Gifts

Create a memorial for yourself or a loved one with a future gift through your estate plan.

Contact Director of Planned Giving Sarah Rutledge at 312-742-9570 or srutledge@lpzoo.org.

Learn More
